contents:
ohio警方认为似乎和刷单有关

Since then we have done some researching and it does appear that these seeds are tied with an online scam called "brushing". A brushing scam is an exploit by a vendor used to bolster product ratings and increase visibility online by shipping an inexpensive product to an unwitting receiver and then submitting positive reviews on the receiver's behalf under the guise of a verified owner.



https://www.facebook.com/whitehousepdoh/posts/1543895642438424
